known_issues: Student opening a level shows validation errors: 'Subject is required. Chapter ID is required. Category is required. Please go back and select a valid practice session.'; contributor-added questions not visible to students.

existing_features.title: Remove the ability to delete individual questions from the Contributor Panel UI (remove any delete/trash controls, the delete confirmation dialog, and any wiring that triggers single-question deletion).

Fix the student practice flow so opening a level/category launches a valid practice session without showing: "Subject is required. Chapter ID is required. Category is required. Please go back and select a valid practice session." Restore the navigation/parameter passing behavior to match the working previous version.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the 'remove/delete question' option in contributor mode

Fix student view: questions added by contributor should be visible; opening a level should not show 'Subject/Chapter ID/Category is required' practice session validation error (restore previous behavior)

Ensure questions created by contributors are visible in student mode (including when the student is not logged in) by allowing read-only access to chapter/question query endpoints used by the student flow.

projectName: Restore student practice navigation and remove question deletion controls from contributor mode
